m1.title: Cosmic Odyssey
m1.description: An epic journey through space and time as humanity searches for a new home among the stars. Stunning visuals and thought-provoking themes make this a must-see cinematic experience.

m2.title: The Last Detective
m2.description: A hardboiled detective faces his most challenging case yet in this neo-noir thriller. As the bodies pile up, he must confront demons from his past to catch a killer.

m3.title: Laugh Out Loud
m3.description: A hilarious comedy about a struggling comedian who accidentally becomes an internet sensation. Feel-good entertainment perfect for the whole family.

m4.title: Eternal Love
m4.description: A timeless love story that spans decades. Two souls destined to be together face the challenges of life, war, and time itself in this emotional journey.

m5.title: Shadow Warriors
m5.description: An elite team of special operatives must stop a global threat in this explosive action thriller. Non-stop adrenaline from start to finish.

m6.title: The Haunting Hour
m6.description: A family moves into a seemingly perfect house, only to discover it harbors dark secrets. Terrifying supernatural horror that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
